plugins.name: Essentials
plugins.desc:
Essential commands
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

plugins.name: Essentials Spawn
plugins.desc:
Setup a server spawn point.
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

plugins.name: Essentials Chat
plugins.desc:
Format the chat to make it look nicer.
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

plugins.name: Essentials Kit Adder
plugins.desc:
Add kits with commands
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

plugins.name: Essentials Group Manager
plugins.desc:
Create permission systems.
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

plugins.name: Permissions Ex
plugins.desc: Create permission systems.

plugins.name: No Cheat Plus
plugins.desc:
Anti-cheat system to block bad modifications. 
&aProtocolLib is &a&nrecommended&r&a while using No Cheat Plus.

plugins.name: World Edit
plugins.desc: Build tools.

plugins.name: Fast Async WorldEdit
plugins.desc: Extremely optimized WorldEdit to use when working with big numbers.

plugins.name: AsyncWorldEdit
plugins.desc:
WorldEdit with reduced lag.
&cRequires &nWorldEdit&c and &nAsyncWorldEditInjector&r&c to be installed.

plugins.name: AsyncWorldEditInjector
plugins.desc: Required plugin for &nAsyncWorldEdit&r

plugins.name: goBrush
plugins.desc: A plugin with brushes and height maps for terraforming.

plugins.name: World Guard
plugins.desc: Create and manage regions using this plugin.

plugins.name: Vault
plugins.desc: Economy, Permissions, and Chat API.

plugins.name: Placeholder API
plugins.desc: API which gives plugins access to variables to display.

plugins.name: ProtocolLib
plugins.desc: API which allows plugins to access new functions.

plugins.name: ChestShop
plugins.desc: Chestshops that allow players to sell/buy items.

plugins.name: Crack Shot
plugins.desc: Guns in Minecraft.

plugins.name: Crates Plus
plugins.desc: Crates to give out rewards to players with keys.

plugins.name: Shopkeepers
plugins.desc: Create customizable villager shops with this plugin.

plugins.name: Silk Spawners
plugins.desc: Create and pick up custom mob spawners.

plugins.name: MineResetLite
plugins.desc: Create mines that will reset.

plugins.name: Orebfuscator
plugins.desc:
Counter X-Ray, resource packs, chest radars
and other similar exploits.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 3 and ProtocolLib

plugins.name: Chat Control
plugins.desc: Control aspects of the chat and prevent swearing/spamming.

plugins.name: Lockette
plugins.desc: Personal chest protection system.

plugins.name: EZRanksPro
plugins.desc:
Simple auto rankup plugin.
&cRequires Vault and a permissions plugin.
&cScoreboards will reset when installed.

plugins.name: Combat Log
plugins.desc: Punish players who log out during combat!

plugins.name: Libs Disguises
plugins.desc:
Disguise as mobs!
&cRequires &nProtocolLib&r

plugins.name: Create Your Own Menus
plugins.desc: Allows you to create your own GUI menus!

plugins.name: Project Korra
plugins.desc:
Bring the elemental powers of
Avatar: the Last Airbender
into your server.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 3 &cto install.

plugins.name: EchoPet
plugins.desc: EchoPet is no longer supported for 1.9+. It will not work!

plugins.name: SonarPet
plugins.desc: A fork of EchoPet updated for 1.9.

plugins.name: ObsidianAuctions
plugins.desc:
Unique chat based auction system.
&cThis plugin requires &nVault&c.

plugins.name: VoxelSniper
plugins.desc: Long range map editing tool for terraforming.

plugins.name: BetterCombat
plugins.desc:
Moves the combat style back to 1.7/1.8
Removes attack speed, adds block hitting, etc.

plugins.name: Trade+
plugins.desc: Lets players easily and safely trade items via a GUI.

plugins.name: Action Announcer
plugins.desc: Create timed broadcasts for your server through the action bar.

plugins.name: UltraBar
plugins.desc: Send Boss Bar messages, Titles, and Actionbars!

plugins.name: Holographic Displays
plugins.desc: Make floating messages around your world.

plugins.name: SuperTrails
plugins.desc: Colorful cosmetic trails to get around fabulously.

plugins.name: CustomEnchants
plugins.desc: Custom enchantments and levels!

plugins.name: Citizens
plugins.desc:
Create custom and interactive NPCs.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 1&c to install.
&cCan cause extreme lag. Lots of free RAM is required!

plugins.name: CommandNPC
plugins.desc:
Add right-clickable commands to your NPCs.
&cThis plugin requires &nCitizens&c.

plugins.name: McMMO
plugins.desc:
RPG experience in Minecraft!
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 1&c to install.

plugins.name: Factions
plugins.desc:
Claim land, build a base and wage war!
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 2&c to install.

plugins.name: Obsidian Breaker
plugins.desc:
Allows explosions to break Obsidian!
&aWorks well with Factions raiding.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 2&c to install.

plugins.name: ASkyBlock
plugins.desc:
Survive on Skyblock islands.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 2&c and &nVault&c.

plugins.name: ASkyGrid
plugins.desc:
Survive in a grid of blocks.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 2&c and &nVault&c.

plugins.name: Towny
plugins.desc:
Towny is a versatile, player-controlled land management plugin.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 4&c to install.

plugins.name: TownyChat
plugins.desc:
This is required if you want to let Towny modify chat.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 4&c to install.

plugins.name: VoidWorld
plugins.desc:
Create void-worlds with this and Multiverse-Core.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 4&c to install.

plugins.name: PlotSquared
plugins.desc:
PlotSquared is a land management plugin.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 4&c to install.

plugins.name: Core Protect
plugins.desc:
Fast, efficient block logging and anti-griefing tool
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 2&c to install.

plugins.name: Log by Bayside308
plugins.desc:
Log block changes in your world.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 2&c to install.

plugins.name: Joe's Horse Collect
plugins.desc: Collect, transport, place and spawn horses.

plugins.name: Joe Marriage
plugins.desc: Added marriages and divorces to your server.

plugins.name: Loot Protect
plugins.desc: Protects loot dropped upon death.

plugins.name: ClearLag
plugins.desc:
Helps clear the lag on your server.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 1&c to install.

plugins.name: Scaffold
plugins.desc:
A multi-world plugin developed by Minehut.
Allows importing worlds through commands!
This plugin is recommended over Multiverse-Core
&cRequires &nTier 4&c to install.

plugins.name: Multiverse-Core
plugins.desc:
Multi-world management.
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 4&c to install.

plugins.name: Punishment
plugins.desc:
Punish your players more effectively! 
&cNote: May prevent scoreboards from properly displaying. 
&cThis plugin requires &nTier 2 &cto install.

plugins.name: AutoMessage
plugins.desc:
A fully in-game edited automatic broadcast system. 
&cThis requires &nTier 1 &cto install.

plugins.name: Title Welcome Message
plugins.desc: Add welcome messages via titles, tablist headers/footers, etc.

plugins.name: Nametag Edit
plugins.desc: Edit tablist/scoreboard prefixes and suffixes

plugins.name: ServerSpy
plugins.desc:
A toggleable way to view the commands
your players are executing.

plugins.name: Area Shop
plugins.desc: Allows for the buying and renting of worldguard regions

plugins.name: CmdSigns
plugins.desc: Fully customizable command signs

plugins.name: AutoColor
plugins.desc: Permission based auto chat color

plugins.name: ChatColor+
plugins.desc:
Allows your users with permissions
to change their name/chat color!

plugins.name: QualityArmory
plugins.desc: A plugin similar to Crackshot for newer minecraft versions.
